column5: Hello,  I'm heading up to a lake called "Three Mile Lake" around Lake Muskoka in Utterson, Ontario. I have never been there before so if any body has please let me know how you did or if you could give me any tips/suggestions that would be appreciated as well.  Thanks everyone!

Three mile has a good population of pickerel ... head to the 24' deep area at the far north-eastern end of the lake and fish along the wall ( about 50' from shore early in the morning or late in the evening .. just drift a good ol worm a few feet off bottom will do ya  Good luck
